mapper.select: select diet_id from DietRecords where member_id = #{member_id} and record_date = #{record_date} and meal_type = #{meal_type}
mapper.delete: delete from DietItems where item_name = #{item_name} and diet_id = #{diet_id};
mapper.update: update DietItems set calories = #{calories}, quantity = #{quantity}, carbs = #{carbs}, fat = #{fat}, protein = #{protein} where item_name = #{item_name} and diet_id = #{diet_id};
mapper.select: SELECT d.meal_type AS mealType, SUM(i.calories) AS totalCalories, SUM(i.carbs) AS totalCarbs, SUM(i.protein) AS totalProtein, SUM(i.fat) AS totalFat FROM DietRecords d JOIN DietItems i ON d.diet_id = i.diet_id WHERE d.record_date = #{record_date} AND d.member_id = #{member_id} GROUP BY d.meal_type;
select profile_gender, profile_age , profile_weight ,profile_height, profile_activity_level from UserProfile where member_id = #{member_id};
